Reviews.Title: Great product poor packaging =/
Reviews.Author: Chrystal
Reviews.Content: The Item arrived with a scratched screen. Other than that this is a great little tablet its a bit slow but gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: What a GREAT tablet!!!!!!! Never thought you could get so much value for money, this tablet is used by everybody in our family including my 4 year old daughter who can't get enough of it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Very fast performance from a 1.5Ghz Dual Core Processor (twice as fast as a 1.5Ghz single core) with Mali 400 quad core graphics processor for superb games and video performance.
High Def screen can show 1080p movies in 1024 x 600 resolution, powered by a Mali Quad Core graphics engine it can output true 1080p through it's built in Mini HDMI port
512Mb of Ram and up to 32Gb of storage via Micro SD with 4Gb Built in
802.11 b/g/n WiFi built in supports 3G or 4G dongles through usb add-on cable (sold separately)
USB out Multi Region Charger for UK, EU and USA included in every box along with USB-Micro USB cable, 3 Hours full use or video playback from battery charge, extendable to 9 hours through add on battery pack (sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: BWC 7 Inch Kidi-Value V4.2 Dual Core Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean) Tablet PC Ideal for Children and Adults alike, Slim, Fast and excellent Value with and 1024x600 High Def, Widescreen Display and HDMI out port for use as a media player
